goal: Help user learn a new language

steps.text: Greet the customer and ask if they want to practice phrases, vocabulary or grammer and in what language
If the customer wants to practice phrases, use the language as input and route to ${AGENT:cf765624-5bcd-4b39-839e-8a163dbcf6bf}
